attributes.name: anchor
attributes.description: The HTML ID of the element the region is positioned relative to

attributes.name: viewport
attributes.description: The HTML ID of the viewport the region is positioned relative to

attributes.name: horizontal-positioning-mode
attributes.description: How the horizontal placement is determined

attributes.name: horizontal-default-position
attributes.description: The default horizontal position of the region relative to the configured 'Anchor ID'

attributes.name: horizontal-inset
attributes.description: Determines whether the region should overlap the anchor on the horizontal axis

attributes.name: horizontal-viewport-lock
attributes.description: Determines whether the region remains in the viewport (ie. detaches from the anchor) on the horizontal axis

attributes.name: horizontal-threshold
attributes.description: The space allocated to the default position before the widest area is selected for layout

attributes.name: horizontal-scaling
attributes.description: Defines how the width of the region is calculated

attributes.name: vertical-positioning-mode
attributes.description: How the vertical placement is determined

attributes.name: vertical-default-position
attributes.description: The default vertical position of the region relative to the configured 'Anchor ID'

attributes.name: vertical-inset
attributes.description: Determines whether the region should overlap the anchor on the vertical axis

attributes.name: vertical-viewport-lock
attributes.description: Determines whether the region remains in the viewport (ie. detaches from the anchor) on the vertical axis

attributes.name: vertical-threshold
attributes.description: The space allocated to the default position before the widest area is selected for layout

attributes.name: vertical-scaling
attributes.description: Defines how the width of the region is calculated

attributes.name: fixed-placement
attributes.description: Fixed placement allows the region to break out of parent containers

attributes.name: auto-update-mode
attributes.description: Defines whether the component automatically updates its position
